content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position unknown)

### Coal extraction point at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Coal (position unknown)

### Iron plate factory at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position unknown)
- Furnace (position unknown)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to craft items without required ingredients
- Ensure you have all necessary ingredients in your inventory before crafting items. For example, iron-plates are required to craft iron-gear-wheels.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it.
